# QuizzieD Project Instructions

This is a React + Vite application with TypeScript and Framer Motion for animations.

## Project Structure
- Modern React 18 with TypeScript
- Vite for fast development and building
- Framer Motion for smooth animations
- CSS custom properties for theming

## Key Features
- Animated homepage with gradient text
- Wave transition effect (right → left → right)
- Responsive design with modern color palette
- Clean navigation menu

## Development
- Use `npm run dev` to start development server
- Use `npm run build` to create production build
- Animations are optimized for performance
